content.rendered:
Directed by S.J. Clarkson.

Written by Melissa James Gibson. Melissa James Gibson. David E. Kelley. David E. Kelley. Sarah Vaughan.

Cast  Rupert Friend( James Whitehouse ) . Michelle Dockery( Kate Woodcroft ) . Sebastian Selwood( Finn Whitehouse ) . Amelie Bea Smith( Emily Whitehouse ) . Ben Radcliffe( Young James ) . Naomi Scott( Olivia Lytton ) . Josette Simon( Angela Regan ) . Kudzai Sitima( Maggie ) . Jonathan Coy( Judge Aled Luckhurst ) . Tom Turner( John Vestey ) . Joshua McGuire( Chris Clarke ) . Nancy Farino( Holly ) . Violet Verigo( Krystyna ) . Elizabeth Chan( Female QC 1 ) . Missy Malek( Nikita (Clerk) ) . Liz White( Ali ) . Julia Warr( Jury Foreperson ) . Hannah Dodd( Young Sophie ) . Jonathan Firth( Richard ) . Geoffrey Streatfeild( Tom Southern ) . Richard McCabe( Brian Taylor ) . Jake Simmance( Young Tom ) . Luka Sheppard( Alec (Libertine) ) . Arazou( Junior Barrister 2 ) . Ralph Davis( Junior Barrister 1 ) . Anna Madeley( Ellie Frisk ) . Rosalie Craig( Lucy ) . Jane How( Madame Speaker ) . Natasha Magigi( Mrs. Addington ) . Annie Haworth( Alison ) . Kathryn Wilder( Kitty Ledger ) . George Stay( James Lookalike ) . Edmund Kingsley( Mark Frisk ) . Maggie Steed( Sibyl Murray ) . Sid Sagar( Raj ) . Clayton Grover( Kenneth ) . Adrian Lukis( Aitkin ) . Phoebe Nicholls( Tuppence Whitehouse ) . Richard Styles( TV Reporter ) . Jane Fowler( PR Liaison ) . Chereen Buckley( Anchor Woman ) . Junior Buron( Ollie ) . Rudy Blue( Ollie’s Older Brother ) . Sonny Poon Tip( Dan ) . Niamh Lynch( Waitress ) . Rob Jarvis( Press 1 ) . Munirih Grace( Press 2 ) . Clive Francis( Lawrence Hughes-Davies ) . Barnaby Kay( Detective Sergeant Willis ) . Christopher Godwin( Dr. Howard Blackburn ) . Eleanor de Rohan( Detective Constable Rydon ) . Iwan Davies( Patrick ) . Ruth Clarson( Teacher (uncredited) ) . Ray Burnet( Rolls-Royce Driver (uncredited) ) . Ian Harrod( Member of Parliament (uncredited) )

Language English.

Producers Allie Goss. David E. Kelley. Mark Kinsella. Bruna Papandrea. Richard Styles. Liza Chasin. S.J. Clarkson. Melissa James Gibson. Margaret Chernin. Sarah Vaughan.

Production 3dot productions. David E. Kelley Productions. Made Up Stories.

 

Number of Seasons 1

Number of Episodes 6

Status Finished (2022–2022)
